entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
